column6: Everything comes to a head in this Secret Wars sequel to the classic X-Tinction Agenda! With the emergence of a repowered Cameron Hodge all the X-Men must band together to take down their resurgent foe. But even with their combined might, not everyone may be walking away from this fight.
column8: | artist:Carmine DiGiandomenico | writer:Marc Guggenheim | penciller (cover):David Nakayama
